item.title: Getting started with silex
item.description: Installation or Setup # Consider following directory structure to comply with best practices: [ProjectRoot] |---[app] | |---[resources] | routes.php |---[web] | |---[resources] | | |---[css] | | |---[img] | | |---[js] | .htaccess | index.php |---[src] |---[var] |---[vendor] composer.json composer.lock Composer is the most flexible way to get started with Silex. Create a directory to host your Silex application (Named ProjectRoot above), cd to that directory and run the following command to create a composer.
